attributes.action: Prevent Liz Davis leaving BPP Bristol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Liz is an integral part of the team who is valued by both students and other staff members alike.

We feel that the business will be much poorer for her absence and implore the Prime Minister to issue a Green Paper with a view to creating the 'CTA Paper I prizewinners shall not be allowed to leave their employers within ten years of qualifying Act 2008'.

We feel this is more worthy of Parliamentary time than discussing 42 day detention of suspected terrorists.

Mr Brown needs a few populist policies to revive his flagging fortunes in teh polls - what better place to start?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
